WnSWinnie.Gift.Dislike: No thanks. I don't like this.
WnSWinnie.DailyDialogue.1: Hi. This should be the first time we talk.$1
WnSWinnie.DailyDialogue.2: This is the second time we talk.$14
WnSWinnie.DailyDialogue.3: Didn't expect to talk with you 3 times already.$10
WnSWinnie.DailyDialogue.4: Do you know that 4 is considered a unfortunate number? It rhythms with "death" in some language.
WnSWinnie.DailyDialogue.5: I believe this is the last unique dialogue. After today, I will repeat randomly all the previous dialogues.$13
